name: react-starter
description: react starter template with browserify, parcelify build tools

scripts.build: browserify main.js -t babelify -o public/js/bundle.js -p [ parcelify -o public/css/bundle.css ] -d
scripts.watch: watchify main.js -t babelify -o public/js/bundle.js -p [ parcelify -wo public/css/bundle.css --loglevel verbose ] -dv

author: sandeepkumaar.c
